Our Services

  1. HOME
  3. SERVICES

Engine Repair

Comprehensive engine diagnostics and repairs, from minor adjustments to full rebuilds, ensuring your engine runs smoothly and efficiently.

Transmission Services

Expert transmission diagnostics and repairs, including fluid replacement, clutch repair, and transmission rebuilds to keep your vehicle shifting smoothly.

Tire and Wheel Services

Professional tire balancing, alignment, and rotation services to ensure even wear, fuel efficiency, and a smooth ride.

Car Painting

High-quality painting services to restore your car's shine or give it a fresh new look, using advanced color matching for precision.

Brake Services

Brake inspections, repairs, and replacements to ensure your safety and control, using high-quality parts for reliable stopping power.

Computer Diagnostics

Advanced computer diagnostics to identify issues accurately, from engine performance to emissions, ensuring optimal car health.

New Age Motors

At our car repair center, we provide top-notch services to ensure your vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently. Our experienced technicians are dedicated to delivering quality repairs and maintenance.

Whether you need routine maintenance or complex repairs, we have the expertise and equipment to get the job done right. Trust us to keep your car in excellent condition.
